article_title: Obamacare Growing Pains Trigger Rise In Unpaid Hospital Bills

article_metadata.description: The first two years of broader health insurance coverage under the Affordable Care Act has been a boon to hospitals, but entering 2016 there could be cause for concern. The nation’s investor-owned hospital companies began to report slowing hospital admission growth in the third quarter and new reports indicate an increase [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
